article.headline: Fairfield 70, Sacred Heart 54
article.story: BRIDGEPORT, Conn. -- Warren Edney scored 14 points to lead Fairfield to a 68-54 defeat of Sacred Heart on Tuesday night. The Stags (1-1) never trailed, starting with Jonathan Han's 3-pointer 30 seconds into the game, and rolled to an easy win in the second meeting between the Fairfield-based schools. Ryan Olander hit a 3-pointer at 14:22 of the second half to give Fairfield a 48-36 lead and the Stags enjoyed a double-digit edge the rest of the way. Han added 11 points as the Stags placed four players in double figures. Greg Nero had 13 points and Anthony Johnson had 12 with eight rebounds. Joey Henley led SHU (0-2) with 18 points. Ryon Howard added 11. Mehmet Sahan scored back-to-back baskets in the paint for SHU's only points in the final four minutes. He finished with 8 points.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
